item.description: Jackie Chung and Rachel Blanchard, who play Laurel and Susannah, respectively, talk about the epic final season of the Jenny Han-created hit and how Susannah’s “message got a bit misconstrued” between

item.title: Lola Tung, Christopher Briney on Their ‘Summer I Turned Pretty’ Ending and What’s Next
item.description: The stars of Jenny Han’s hit coming-of-age drama break down that passionate and vulnerable series finale, and why they believe Conrad takes “Belly at her word” during that final confession.
